text: If you love plants, you're going to love this. Vertical farming can increase yield per square foot up to 10 times compared to traditional farming methods. It uses up to 70% less water, making it a sustainable solution for growing fresh produce in urban environments. Is this something you would try in your backyard? Tell us in the comments below.
